Package controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateNewTest1Controller, CreateNewTest2Controller, DeleteTestController, GetQuestionsController, IndexController, LoginController, RenderQuestionController, RenderTestController, SignoutController, SignupController, StudentAnswerFileController, TestController, TestsController, UploadStudentAnswersController
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for all controllers. Has the shared PersistentStorage object for all other controllers to inherit.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static PersistentStorage persistentStorage
      This PersistentStorage object is shared with all other controllers and used to permanently store data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller​(PersistentStorage persistentStorage)
      Create a new generic Controller object.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • persistentStorage

        protected static PersistentStorage persistentStorage
        This PersistentStorage object is shared with all other controllers and used to permanently store data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller​(PersistentStorage persistentStorage)
        Create a new generic Controller object. For any controller, this MUST be called before using the controller in order to pass in the shared PersistentStorage object.
        Parameters:
        persistentStorage - The shared PersistentStorage object used for storing permanent data.
